snippet.title: Neftelia 2 playthrough - RPG Maker surreal exploration game (ver. 0.03)
snippet.description:
Warning:
- Epilepsy
- Horror elements
- Loud noises/jumpscares

Download site: etgmz14.g1.xrea.com/nef2ss.html

TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 Title screen music, starting the game (EPILEPSY WARNING)
2:33 Exploring, Turning on the Red Light, Unlocking a Shortcut
7:11 Getting MOVIE CLIP 1, Exploring, Turning on the Green Light
10:21 Watching the Movie Clip (EPILEPSY WARNING)
10:57 Exploring, Getting MOVIE CLIP 6, Turning on the Blue Light, Getting MOVIE CLIP 4
17:51 Watching the Movie Clips (EPILEPSY WARNING)
19:00 Getting MOVIE CLIPS 3 and 5, exploring the Flooded Earth, Extinguishing some candles, Unlocking a Shortcut
28:00 Extinguishing the last candle, Getting MOVIE CLIP 8
29:00 Getting MOVIE CLIP 2
30:34 Finding a secret near the Maze, Exploring the Maze, Triggering Warai's Revenge EVENT, Finding a way back to Space
37:27 Getting MOVIE CLIP 7 (must have triggered all switches)
42:15 Finding some Stones
43:48 Seeing Warai's Revenge EVENT (sorry it takes a long time to find what i'm looking for)
50:48 Getting MOVIE CLIP 9 (must have collected all 8 other Movie Clips)
52:25 Watching the completed Movie (EPILEPSY WARNING)
55:28 Seeing ENDING 1
56:12 Going to a hidden unlocked entrance
58:05 Exploring the Hidden Area
1:00:21 Seeing ENDING 2 (EPILEPSY WARNING)
